mapper.select: select count(*) from seeker where seeker_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into seeker (seeker_id, seeker_pw, seeker_name, seeker_email, seeker_sex) values (#{seekerId},#{seekerPw},#{seekerName},#{seekerEmail},#{seekerSex})
mapper.select: select count(*) from offer where offer_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into offer (offer_id, offer_pw, offer_name, offer_account, bank, offer_email, offer_cash, company_no, company_name) values (#{offerId}, #{offerPw}, #{offerName}, #{offerAccount}, #{bank}, #{offerEmail}, #{offerCash}, #{companyNo}, #{companyName})
